songInfo.recordDate: recording of July 29 1969, New York City
songInfo.album: from Hide Away: The Best of Freddie King (Rhino R2-71510) ,

lyrics.l: I know you heard about the blues
But I would like to give you my feeling of the blues
So if you just sit down for a few minutes and listen to me
I'll give you my feeling of the blues, because I think I got 'em
